channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- General Ledger
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- General Ledger

item.title: CVE-2020-2750|2024-09-30T15:42:43.040Z -- oracle%20corporation -- general%20ledger
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle General Ledger product of Oracle E-Business Suite (component: Account Hierarchy Manager). Supported versions that are affected are 12.1.1-12.1.3 and 12.2.3-12.2.9. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle General Ledger. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all Oracle General Ledger accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 7.5 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N).
